It also has a larger context window, allowing for longer, and more nuanced searches. The basic version of Sonar charges $1 per million input and output tokens and $5 per 1,000 searches, while the Sonar pro version costs $3 per million, $15 per million output tokens, and $ 5 per 1 million searches.
